application.internship_title: Application for Internship - Founders Associate Intern - Special Projects
application.role_activities: Collaborate directly with the co-founders and senior team on new digital SaaS products. Work hands-on to gather information from customers and the market. Build dashboards and analyze performance data and product usage to uncover trends, bottlenecks, and growth opportunities. Help improve cross-team alignment by creating playbooks or coordinating knowledge-sharing between departments.
application.requirements_for_the_internship: Studying at a top university with strong entrepreneurial focus. Fluent in English with C2 level proficiency in German. Experience in a startup environment. Hands-on approach. Curiosity about how tech, operations, and business strategy come together in high-growth companies. Structured thinker who is not afraid to get into details, run numbers, and execute fast. Eager to invest time beyond standard hours. Available for a 4-6 month internship in the Berlin office.
